version 1.0

VERSION HISTORY


VERSION IMPLEMENTED BY REVISION DATE REASON
1.0 Nivethika REPORT









Table of Contents



S.NO TITLE PAGE NO
01 Aim 3
02 Summary 3
03 Navigation & Visualization 3
04 CMS Plant Overview 4
05 Portolio Dashboard 4
06 Communication Table 5
07 Monthly/Yearly Report 5
08 a.Plant Active Power status 6
09 b.Inverter Active Power satuts 6
10 Plant perforamance status screen 7
11 Inverter overview 7
12 Overall Genertion Report 8









01. Aim


This document gives an overview of iPLON IoT 6.0 SCADA navigation and visualization for 50 MW solar PV power plant.


2. Summary


Overview of all SCADA screens along with Visualization of HMI screens like Inverter Rooms, Control Rooms, and Weather station etc. Visualizing the real time data on all the available screens with HMI interface. The Screens are flexible and it is developed according to the requirement from customer.


3. Navigation & Visualization


Background color for all screens: Black. In the top of Plant Overview Screen, navigation buttons to all the folders like Plant Overview, SLD, PV block, Plant Generation, Trends, Energy meter, Reports, Alarms, Power control, Plant DI & DO and Inverter overview is given. Once click on the folder it will be navigating to the respective dashboards under that folder shown in fig below. Also in the top line, Screen selection, Share Dashboard, Date selection & Refresh for each 1 min are displayed.


4.CMS Plant Overview


CMS Plant Overview screen shows the Installed capacity of the plant, and location. It also shows the current date and time in IST and the performance ratio displayed in the meter. The plant data are shows as total energy generation from the date of commissioning, energy yield today and yesterday with solar radiation, Ambient Temperature & Peak power.
Also it shows the plant details in left corner with version. All the parameters are displayed in such a manner that
DC instantaneous value – Light Green colour & DC Cumulative value – Dark Green.
AC instantaneous value – Light Orange color & AC Cumulative value – Dark Green.











5. Portfolio Dashboard


Click on the Navigation “Energy meter overview“provided on right top corner of the Home screen. Under this Energy meter readings are displayed. This screen shows the Active Power, EAE, EAE DAY values of all blocks (From B01 to B13) and for Control rooms.



6. Communication Table


This screen shows the DC Power(kW), Active power(kW), Reactive Power(kVAR), Energy Day(MWh),Temperature in Deg C & real time PR (%) of each inverter of all blocks (From B01 to B13).











7. Monthly/Yearly Report


This screen shows complete plant structure of a Plot. It represents the energy flow from solar PV to Blocks and there to control room and to the feeder. SLD gives the clear picture of the system with energy in each stage



8. a.Plant Active Power


This screen shows the current generation of each Block(B01-B08,B10-B13), Energy export per day and cumulative,Performance ration and capacity utilisation factor.











8. b.Inverter Active POwer status


This screen shows the current generation of Block-09, Energy export per day and cumulative,Performance ration and capacity utilisation factor.



9. Plant Performanace status screen


The Report dashboard has below reports which comprises of 1 min, 15 min, day, monthly & yearly reports and can be extracted as excel.
-- Block Per Min Report
-- Incomer/Outgoing Feeder MFM Report
-- Monthly Report
-- WMS One Min Report
-- Plant Generation Report
-- DGR Report











10. Inverter Overview


This screen shows the Block wise Inverter parameters like active power, generation & Inverter IGBT temeprature and plant level trends in different dashboards.



11. Overall Generation Report


This screen shows the Block wise Inverter parameters like active power, generation & Inverter IGBT temperature and plant level trends in different dashboards.

import sys
import os
import time
import pytz
import calendar
import datetime
import pandas as pd
from datetime import date
from influxdb_client import InfluxDBClient, Point, WritePrecision, WriteOptions
from influxdb_client.client.write_api import SYNCHRONOUS, ASYNCHRONOUS

influx_url="http://localhost:8087/"
influx_token="pNNW_glBJ_PH_Elpft-l85BC570_MLlDJOo69DE5CERDSNovQI5z1GusUVL1qBadlMWRCHirPOWh92wdbk0vtg=="
organisation="Test"
source_database="egaugemeter"
source_database_table="report"
dest_database="egaugemeter"
dest_database_table="report"

client = InfluxDBClient(url=influx_url, token=influx_token, org=organisation)
write_api = client.write_api(write_options=SYNCHRONOUS)
query_api = client.query_api()

#timestamp = ("""1640975400000 1767168792000""")
timestamp = ("""{{payload}}""")
b = (timestamp.split())
start_time = time.strftime("%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ", time.gmtime(int(b[0])/1000.0))
stop_time = time.strftime("%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ", time.gmtime(int(b[1])/1000.0))

def frame_influx_query(source_database, source_database_table, plant, device, field):
    if source_database and source_database_table and plant and field:
        query = ' from(bucket: \"'+source_database+'\")  |> range(start: '+start_time+', stop: '+stop_time+')  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == \"'+source_database_table+'\")  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["plant"] == \"'+plant+'\")  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["device"] == \"'+device+'\")  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["field"] == \"'+field+'\")  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")  |> yield(name: "last")'
    return query


plant = "egauge75568"
device = ['EM']
field = "EAE_DAY"

points = []
outvalue = []
outyear = []
outmonth = []
outplant = []

for i in range(len(device)):
    my_q_str = frame_influx_query(source_database, source_database_table, plant, device[i], field)
    #print(my_q_str)
    result = query_api.query(query=my_q_str)
    points_day_array=[]
    for table in result:
        for record in table.records:
            points_value = record.get_value()
            points_time = time.strftime("%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ", time.gmtime(int(record.get_time().timestamp())))
            points_day = {
            "time": points_time,
            "last": points_value
            }
            points_day_array.append(points_day)
    df = pd.DataFrame(points_day_array)
    #print(df)

    pd.set_option('display.max_columns', None)  
    pd.set_option('display.max_rows', None)  
    df.time = pd.to_datetime(df.time)
    df["Date_IST"] = pd.to_datetime(df["time"]) + pd.DateOffset(hours=5, minutes=30)
    df['Date'] = pd.to_datetime(df['Date_IST']).dt.date
    df['Time'] = pd.to_datetime(df['Date_IST']).dt.time
    df.Date = pd.to_datetime(df.Date)
    df = df.groupby('Date').sum('last')
    df = df.groupby(df.index.to_period('m')).cumsum().reset_index()
    df1 = df.groupby('Date').sum('last')
    df1 = df1.groupby(df1.index.to_period('y')).cumsum().reset_index()
    df['month'] = pd.to_datetime(df['Date']).dt.month
    df['year'] = pd.to_datetime(df['Date']).dt.year
 
    monthname = df['month'].iloc[0]
    year = df['year'].iloc[0]   
    l = len(df)

    #---------------Month Cum Calculation start----------------#
    for j in range(l):
        tmp = df['month'].iloc[j]
        tmpyear = df['year'].iloc[j]
        if ((monthname != tmp) and (tmpyear == year)):
            valid = j-1
            if pd.isnull(df['last'].iloc[valid]) != True:
                outvalue += [df['last'].iloc[valid]]
                outyear += [df['year'].iloc[valid]]
                outmonth += [df['month'].iloc[valid]]
                outplant += [device[i]]
            else:
                if tmp == 1:
                    tmp = 13
                k = valid - 1
                while k < valid:
                    if ((pd.isnull(df['last'].iloc[k]) == False) and ((tmp-1) == monthname)):
                        break
                    k -= 1
                outvalue += [df['last'].iloc[k]]
                outyear += [df['year'].iloc[k]]
                outmonth += [df['month'].iloc[k]]
                outplant += [device[i]]
                if tmp == 13:
                   tmp = 1
        elif ((monthname != tmp) and (tmpyear != year)): 
            valid = j-1
            if pd.isnull(df['last'].iloc[valid]) != True:
                outvalue += [df['last'].iloc[valid]]
                outyear += [df['year'].iloc[valid]]
                outmonth += [df['month'].iloc[valid]]
                outplant += [device[i]]
            else:
                if tmp == 1:
                    tmp = 13
                k = valid - 1
                while k < valid:
                    if ((pd.isnull(df['last'].iloc[k]) == False) and ((tmp-1) == monthname)):
                        break
                    k -= 1
                outvalue += [df['last'].iloc[k]]
                outyear += [df['year'].iloc[k]]
                outmonth += [df['month'].iloc[k]]
                outplant += [device[i]]
                if tmp == 13:
                   tmp = 1
        monthname = tmp 
        year = tmpyear    
    
    if ((monthname == tmp) and (tmpyear == year)):
        count = l-1
        if pd.isnull(df['last'].iloc[count]) != True:    	
            outvalue += [df['last'].iloc[count]]
            outyear += [df['year'].iloc[count]]
            outmonth += [df['month'].iloc[count]]
            outplant += [device[i]]
        else:
            m = count - 1
            while m < count:
                if ((pd.isnull(df['last'].iloc[m]) == False) and (monthname == tmp)):
                    break
                m -= 1
            outvalue += [df['last'].iloc[m]]
            outyear += [df['year'].iloc[m]]
            outmonth += [df['month'].iloc[m]]
            outplant += [device[i]]

out = [round(num, 2) for num in outvalue]

#------------------------Month Cum calculation End------------------#

null = df[df['last'].isnull()].index.tolist()
for i in range(len(null)):
    null_date = (df['Date_IST'].iloc[null[i]])

epoch = []

for v in range(len(outvalue)):
    #a_date = str(outyear[v]) + "-" + str(outmonth[v]) + "-" + "01" + "T" + "00" +":" +"00" + ":" + "00Z
    ts = datetime.datetime(outyear[v],outmonth[v],1, 00, 00,00).timestamp()
    ns = int(ts)
    string = str(ns) + "000"
    epoch = time.strftime("%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ", time.gmtime(int(string)/1000.0))
    
    data = [{
        "measurement": dest_database_table,
        "tags": {
            "plant" : plant,
            "device" : outplant[v],
           "meter_id": "75568",
           "field": "EAE_Month"
             },
        "time" : epoch,
        "fields": {
            "value" : out[v]
            }
        }]
    print(data)
    stat = os.system('influx bucket list --host '+influx_url+' --token '+influx_token+' --org '+organisation+' --name '+dest_database+' >> /dev/null')
    if stat != 0:
        stat = os.system('influx bucket create --host '+influx_url+' --token '+influx_token+' --org '+organisation+' --name '+dest_database+' >> /dev/null')
    
    write_api.write(dest_database, organisation, data)

                    k -= 1

                outyear += [df['year'].iloc[k]]

                outplant += [device[i]]
                if tmp == 13:
                   tmp = 1
        elif ((monthname != tmp) and (tmpyear != year)):

                outmonth += [df['month'].iloc[valid]]
                outplant += [device[i]]
            else:

                        break
                    k -= 1
                outvalue += [df['last'].iloc[k]]
                outyear += [df['year'].iloc[k]]
                outmonth += [df['month'].iloc[k]]
                outplant += [device[i]]
                if tmp == 13:
                   tmp = 1
        monthname = tmp

    if ((monthname == tmp) and (tmpyear == year)):
        count = l-1

            outvalue += [df['last'].iloc[count]]
            outyear += [df['year'].iloc[count]]
            outmonth += [df['month'].iloc[count]]
            outplant += [device[i]]
        else:

                    break
                m -= 1
            outvalue += [df['last'].iloc[m]]
            outyear += [df['year'].iloc[m]]
            outmonth += [df['month'].iloc[m]]
            outplant += [device[i]]

out = [round(num, 2) for num in outvalue]

#------------------------Month Cum calculation End------------------#

epoch = []

timestamp = ("""1640975400000 2240524800000""")
#timestamp = ("""{{payload}}""")
b = (timestamp.split())
start_time = time.strftime("%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ", time.gmtime(int(b[0])/1000.0))
stop_time = time.strftime("%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ", time.gmtime(int(b[1])/1000.0))

def frame_influx_query(source_database, source_database_table, plant, device, field):
    if source_database and source_database_table and plant and field:
        query = ' from(bucket: \"'+source_database+'\")  |> range(start: '+start_time+', stop: '+stop_time+')  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == \"'+source_database_table+'\")  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["plant"] == \"'+plant+'\")  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["device"] == \"'+device+'\")  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["field"] == \"'+field+'\")  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")  |> yield(name: "last")'
    return query


plant = "egauge75568"
device = ['EM']
field = "EAE_DAY"

points = []
outvalue = []
outyear = []
outmonth = []
outplant = []

for i in range(len(device)):
    my_q_str = frame_influx_query(source_database, source_database_table, plant, device[i], field)
    #print(my_q_str)
    result = query_api.query(query=my_q_str)
    points_day_array=[]
    for table in result:
        for record in table.records:
            points_value = record.get_value()
            points_time = time.strftime("%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ", time.gmtime(int(record.get_time().timestamp())))
            points_day = {
            "time": points_time,
            "last": points_value
            }
            points_day_array.append(points_day)
    df = pd.DataFrame(points_day_array)

    pd.set_option('display.max_columns', None)

    df.time = pd.to_datetime(df.time)

    df['Date'] = pd.to_datetime(df['Date_IST']).dt.date
    df['Time'] = pd.to_datetime(df['Date_IST']).dt.time
    df.Date = pd.to_datetime(df.Date)
    df = df.groupby('Date').sum('last')
    df = df.groupby(df.index.to_period('m')).cumsum().reset_index()
    df1 = df.groupby('Date').sum('last')
    df1 = df1.groupby(df1.index.to_period('y')).cumsum().reset_index()
    df['month'] = pd.to_datetime(df['Date']).dt.month
    df['year'] = pd.to_datetime(df['Date']).dt.year
 
    monthname = df['month'].iloc[0]
    year = df['year'].iloc[0]   
    l = len(df)

    #---------------Month Cum Calculation start----------------#
    for j in range(l):
        tmp = df['month'].iloc[j]
        tmpyear = df['year'].iloc[j]

                outvalue += [df['last'].iloc[valid]]
                outyear += [df['year'].iloc[valid]]
                outmonth += [df['month'].iloc[valid]]
                outplant += [device[i]]
            else:

                    tmp = 13

                while k < valid:

                        break
                    k -= 1
                outvalue += [df['last'].iloc[k]]
                outyear += [df['year'].iloc[k]]
                outmonth += [df['month'].iloc[k]]
                outplant += [device[i]]
                if tmp == 13:
                   tmp = 1
        elif ((monthname != tmp) and (tmpyear != year)): 
            valid = j-1
            if pd.isnull(df['last'].iloc[valid]) != True:
                outvalue += [df['last'].iloc[valid]]
                outyear += [df['year'].iloc[valid]]
                outmonth += [df['month'].iloc[valid]]
                outplant += [device[i]]
            else:
                if tmp == 1:
                    tmp = 13
                k = valid - 1
                while k < valid:
                    if ((pd.isnull(df['last'].iloc[k]) == False) and ((tmp-1) == monthname)):
                        break
                    k -= 1
                outvalue += [df['last'].iloc[k]]
                outyear += [df['year'].iloc[k]]
                outmonth += [df['month'].iloc[k]]
                outplant += [device[i]]
                if tmp == 13:
                   tmp = 1
        monthname = tmp 
        year = tmpyear    
    
    if ((monthname == tmp) and (tmpyear == year)):
        count = l-1
        if pd.isnull(df['last'].iloc[count]) != True:    	
            outvalue += [df['last'].iloc[count]]
            outyear += [df['year'].iloc[count]]
            outmonth += [df['month'].iloc[count]]
            outplant += [device[i]]
        else:
            m = count - 1
            while m < count:
                if ((pd.isnull(df['last'].iloc[m]) == False) and (monthname == tmp)):
                    break
                m -= 1
            outvalue += [df['last'].iloc[m]]
            outyear += [df['year'].iloc[m]]
            outmonth += [df['month'].iloc[m]]
            outplant += [device[i]]

out = [round(num, 2) for num in outvalue]

#------------------------Month Cum calculation End------------------#

null = df[df['last'].isnull()].index.tolist()
for i in range(len(null)):
    null_date = (df['Date_IST'].iloc[null[i]])

epoch = []

for v in range(len(outvalue)):
    #a_date = str(outyear[v]) + "-" + str(outmonth[v]) + "-" + "01" + "T" + "00" +":" +"00" + ":" + "00Z
    ts = datetime.datetime(outyear[v],outmonth[v],1, 00, 00,00).timestamp()
    ns = int(ts)
    string = str(ns) + "000"
    epoch = time.strftime("%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ", time.gmtime(int(string)/1000.0))
    
    data = [{

version 1.0

VERSION HISTORY


VERSION IMPLEMENTED BY REVISION DATE REASON
1.0 Nivethika & Anushiya REPORT









Table of Contents



S.NO TITLE PAGE NO
01 Aim 3
02 Summary 3
03 Navigation & Visualization 3
04 Plant Overview Screen 4
05 Energy Meter Overview 4
06 System View 5
07 Documentation 5
08 Inverter 6
09 Weather Station 6
10 Inverter PAC/IDC Heatmap 7
11 Inveter Status 7
12.a. Alaram Screen ST3_WO 8
12.b. Alarm Screen ST3_W1 8
12.c. Alaram Screen ST3_W2 9
12.d. Alarm Screen ST3_W3 9
12.e. Alarm Screen ST3_W4 9
12.f. Alarm Screen ST3_W6 9
13 Monthly/Yearly_Report 9









01. Aim


This document gives an overview of iPLON IoT 6.0 Amplus Arjun for 2 MW solar PV power plant.


2. Summary


Overview of all SCADA screens along with Visualization of HMI screens like Inverter Rooms, Control Rooms, and Weather station etc. Visualizing the real time data on all the available screens with HMI interface. The Screens are flexible and it is developed according to the requirement from customer.


3. Navigation & Visualization


Background color for all screens: Black. In the top of Plant Overview Screen, navigation buttons to all the folders like Plant Overview, SLD, PV block, Plant Generation, Trends, Energy meter, Reports, Alarms, Power control, Plant DI & DO and Inverter overview is given. Once click on the folder it will be navigating to the respective dashboards under that folder shown in fig below. Also in the top line, Screen selection, Share Dashboard, Date selection & Refresh for each 1 min are displayed.


4. Plant Overview Screen


Plant Overview screen shows the Installed capacity of the plant, and location. It also shows the current date and time in IST and the performance ratio displayed in the meter. The plant data are shows as total energy generation from the date of commissioning, energy yield today and yesterday with solar radiation, Ambient Temperature & Peak power.


Also it shows the plant details in left corner with version. All the parameters are displayed in such a manner that

DC instantaneous value – Light Green colour & DC Cumulative value – Dark Green.

AC instantaneous value – Light Orange color & AC Cumulative value – Dark Green.











5. Energy Meter Overview


Click on the Navigation "Energy meter overview" provided on right top corner of the home screen.Under this Energy meter readings are displayed.This screen shows the Active power,EAE,EAE DAY values of the block and control room.











6. System View


This screen is used to compare multiple fields with multiple devices. Also used to analyse different parameters at a time..



7. Documentation


This screen shows complete plant structure of a Plot. It represents the energy flow from solar PV to Blocks and there to control room and to the feeder. SLD gives the clear picture of the system with energy in each stage











8. Inverter(AC Power(kW)vs Radiation(W/m2))


This screen shows inverter AC Power (kW) vs Radiation.



This screen shows the Inverter Active power varaiation in the form of heat- map and can be use for better analaysis.


9. Weather Station


The weather station has a variety of sensors for measuring solar irradiation, wind speed and direction, air temperature, relative humidity. Weather Monitoring Data displayed on these pages is obtained from a weather monitoring station located at the plant. Real-time sensor monitoring plus calculated parameters are available in reports and graph.The parameters shown in the weather station are displayed as per the selection of the date. User has the option to select the intervel of from date to date.










10. Inverter PAC/IDC Heatmap


This screen shows the Inverter PAC/ IDC Heatmap .
-- Block Per Min Report
-- Incomer/Outgoing Feeder MFM Report
-- Monthly Report
-- WMS One Min Report
-- Plant Generation Report
-- DGR Report



11. Inverter Status


This screen shows the Inverter Status.











12. a.Alaram Screen ST3_W0


This screen shows the Block wise Inverter parameters like active power, generation & Inverter IGBT temperature and plant level trends in different dashboards.


12. b.Alaram Screen ST3_W1


This screen shows all Block wise energy meter PAC (MW) value. To check one of the Block PAC graph for analysis click on the name given in right side.












12. c.Alarm Screen ST3_W2


This screen shows the Block wise Active power (kW) of all inverters with solar radiation (W/m2).



12. d.Alarm Screen ST3_W3


This screen shows the Generation (kWh) of each block wise inverter with irradiation (kWh/m2)











12. e.Alarm Screen ST3_W4


This screen shows the Block wise Active power (kW) of all inverters with solar radiation (W/m2).



12. f.Alarm Screen ST3_W6


This screen shows the Block wise Active power (kW) of all inverters with solar radiation (W/m2).











13. Monthly/Yearly_Report


This Monthly/Yearly report comprises per day generation of each inverter’s and aggregating into total inv generation and plant end generation for month wise and cumulated to year.

var Total_gen_loss_wechselrichter = 0
var Total_gen_loss_WR_delta_M15A_220 = 0
var Total_gen_loss_ABB_WR1 = 0

var obj
for (var i = 0; i < msg.payload.length; i++)
{  if(i<msg.payload.length){
    var DATE = msg.payload[i].date
    var WR_1_kwh = (msg.payload[i]["WR 1"])/1000 
    var WR_1_Sp_Y = msg.payload[i]["Specific Yield_WR 1"]
    var WR_2_kwh = (msg.payload[i]["WR 2"])/1000 
    var WR_2_Sp_Y = msg.payload[i]["Specific Yield_WR 2"]
    var wechselrichter_kwh = (msg.payload[i].Wechselrichter)/1000
    var WR_delta_M15A_220_kwh = (msg.payload[i]["WR Delta M15A_220"]) / 1000
    var ABB_WR1_kwh = (msg.payload[i]["ABB WR 1"])/1000
    var Delta_kwh = (msg.payload[i].Delta)/1000
    var wechselrichter_Sp_Y = msg.payload[i]["Specific Yield_Wechselrichter"]
    var WR_delta_M15A_220_Sp_Y = msg.payload[i]["Specific Yield_WR Delta M15A_220"]
    var ABB_WR1_Sp_Y = msg.payload[i]["Specific Yield_ABB WR 1"]
    var Delta_Sp_Y = msg.payload[i]["Specific Yield_Delta"]
   

    var Max_sy = Math.max(WR_1_Sp_Y || 0, WR_2_Sp_Y || 0, wechselrichter_Sp_Y || 0, WR_delta_M15A_220_Sp_Y || 0, ABB_WR1_Sp_Y || 0, Delta_Sp_Y || 0)

    var WR1_INV_CAPACITY=inv_cap[0]
    var WR2_INV_CAPACITY = inv_cap[1]
    var wechselrichter_CAPACITY = inv_cap[2]
    var WR_delta_M15A_220_CAPACITY = inv_cap[3]
    var ABB_WR1_CAPACITY = inv_cap[4]
    var Delta_CAPACITY = inv_cap[5]

    var Expected_gen_WR1 = Max_sy * WR1_INV_CAPACITY
    var Expected_gen_WR2 =Max_sy * WR2_INV_CAPACITY
    var Expected_gen_wechselrichter =Max_sy* wechselrichter_CAPACITY
    var Expected_gen_WR_delta_M15A_220 =Max_sy* WR_delta_M15A_220_CAPACITY
    var Expected_gen_ABB_WR1 =Max_sy* ABB_WR1_CAPACITY
    var Expected_gen_Delta =Max_sy* Delta_CAPACITY

    Total_exp_WR1 = Total_exp_WR1 + Expected_gen_WR1
    Total_exp_WR2 = Total_exp_WR2 + Expected_gen_WR2
    Total_exp_wechselrichter= Total_exp_wechselrichter +Expected_gen_wechselrichter
    Total_exp_WR_delta_M15A_220= Total_exp_WR_delta_M15A_220 +Expected_gen_WR_delta_M15A_220
    Total_exp_ABB_WR1= Total_exp_ABB_WR1 +Expected_gen_ABB_WR1
    Total_exp_Delta= Total_exp_Delta +Expected_gen_Delta

    Total_ACT_WR2 = Total_ACT_WR2 + WR_2_kwh
    Total_ACT_wechselrichter=Total_ACT_wechselrichter+wechselrichter_kwh

    Total_ACT_Delta=Total_ACT_Delta+Delta_kwh
    
    if ((Expected_gen_WR1 != WR_1_kwh ) || (WR_1_kwh==0)){ var GEN_LOSS_WR1 = (Expected_gen_WR1 - WR_1_kwh) } else { GEN_LOSS_WR1 = "0"}
    if ((Expected_gen_WR2 != WR_2_kwh) || (WR_2_kwh == 0)) { var GEN_LOSS_WR2 = (Expected_gen_WR2 - WR_2_kwh) } else { GEN_LOSS_WR2 = "0" }
    if ((Expected_gen_wechselrichter !=wechselrichter_kwh ) || (wechselrichter_kwh)) {var GEN_LOSS_wechselrichter=(Expected_gen_wechselrichter -wechselrichter_kwh)} else {GEN_LOSS_wechselrichter ="0"}
    if ((Expected_gen_WR_delta_M15A_220 !=WR_delta_M15A_220_kwh ) || (WR_delta_M15A_220_kwh)) {var GEN_LOSS_WR_delta_M15A_220=(Expected_gen_WR_delta_M15A_220 -WR_delta_M15A_220_kwh)} else {GEN_LOSS_WR_delta_M15A_220 ="0"}
    if ((Expected_gen_ABB_WR1 !=ABB_WR1_kwh ) || (ABB_WR1_kwh)) {var GEN_LOSS_ABB_WR1=(Expected_gen_ABB_WR1 -ABB_WR1_kwh)} else {GEN_LOSS_ABB_WR1 ="0"}
    if ((Expected_gen_Delta !=Delta_kwh ) || (Delta_kwh)) {var GEN_LOSS_Delta=(Expected_gen_Delta -Delta_kwh)} else {GEN_LOSS_Delta ="0"}


    Total_gen_loss_WR1 = Total_gen_loss_WR1 + (Expected_gen_WR1 - WR_1_kwh)
    Total_gen_loss_WR2 = Total_gen_loss_WR2 + (Expected_gen_WR2 - WR_2_kwh)
    Total_gen_loss_wechselrichter = Total_gen_loss_wechselrichter + (Expected_gen_wechselrichter -wechselrichter_kwh  )
    Total_gen_loss_WR_delta_M15A_220 = Total_gen_loss_WR_delta_M15A_220 + (Expected_gen_WR_delta_M15A_220 -WR_delta_M15A_220_kwh  )
    Total_gen_loss_ABB_WR1 = Total_gen_loss_ABB_WR1 + (Expected_gen_ABB_WR1 -ABB_WR1_kwh  )
    Total_gen_loss_Delta = Total_gen_loss_Delta + (Expected_gen_Delta -Delta_kwh  )


    var total_act_gen = [{
        Total_ACT_WR1, Total_ACT_WR2, Total_ACT_wechselrichter,Total_ACT_WR_delta_M15A_220,Total_ACT_ABB_WR1,Total_ACT_Delta}]
    var total_exp_gen = [Total_exp_WR1, Total_exp_WR2, Total_exp_wechselrichter,Total_exp_WR_delta_M15A_220,Total_exp_ABB_WR1,Total_exp_Delta]
    var totalgen_loss = [Total_gen_loss_WR1, Total_gen_loss_WR2,Total_gen_loss_wechselrichter,Total_gen_loss_WR_delta_M15A_220,Total_gen_loss_ABB_WR1,Total_gen_loss_Delta]


    obj = {
        DATE,
         WR_1_kwh,
         WR_1_Sp_Y,
         WR_2_kwh,
        WR_2_Sp_Y,
        wechselrichter_kwh,
        wechselrichter_Sp_Y,
WR_delta_M15A_220_kwh,
WR_delta_M15A_220_Sp_Y,
ABB_WR1_kwh,

         Max_sy,
        Expected_gen_WR1:Expected_gen_WR1.toFixed(2),
        Expected_gen_WR2:Expected_gen_WR2.toFixed(2),
        Expected_gen_wechselrichter:Expected_gen_wechselrichter.toFixed(2),
        Expected_gen_WR_delta_M15A_220:Expected_gen_WR_delta_M15A_220.toFixed(2),
        Expected_gen_ABB_WR1:Expected_gen_ABB_WR1.toFixed(2),
        Expected_gen_Delta:Expected_gen_Delta.toFixed(2),

        
        GEN_LOSS_WR1:parseFloat(GEN_LOSS_WR1).toFixed(2),
        GEN_LOSS_WR2:parseFloat(GEN_LOSS_WR2).toFixed(2),
        GEN_LOSS_wechselrichter:parseFloat(GEN_LOSS_wechselrichter).toFixed(2),

        GEN_LOSS_ABB_WR1:parseFloat(GEN_LOSS_ABB_WR1).toFixed(2),
        GEN_LOSS_Delta:parseFloat(GEN_LOSS_Delta).toFixed(2),
        
    }
}
   /* if (i == msg.payload.length) {

        }

}
